tokenCardRewardDescription: Every xRNBW you earn is a vesting token that you can use to claim RNBW, our governance token, from the Rainbow Pool. Press Harvest to claim your pending xRNBW from the Farm and go to the Vesting Tab to manage your rewards.
stakeToEarn: Stake your Liquidity Pool Tokens (HLP or UNI-V2) to earn Rainbow Pool (xRNBW)!

error-liquidity-zap-reverted: The transaction has reverted. You may increase the slippage tolerance and try again.
error-liquidity-estimates-changed: FX estimation has changed. Please try entering a slightly lower amount.
